headline: Stanley Black & Decker Names Francesca Campbell Senior Vice President, General Counsel
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE: SWK), a global leader in tools and outdoor solutions, today named Francesca Campbell Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary. Campbell joins Stanley Black & Decker from Carrier where she served as Senior Vice President, Chief Legal Officer. Campbell's appointment is effective February 16.
